casebody.data:
No. 11-5721. Corey A. Hill, Petitioner v. United States. 565 U.S. 1154, 132 S. Ct. 1133,

181 L. Ed. 2d 974,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 804. January 17, 2012.

Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted. Stephen E. Eberhardt, Esquire, of Tinley Park, Illinois, is appointed to serve as counsel for the petitioner in this case.
